Class ClubAbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ClubAbstractEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Person

    public abstract class ClubAbstractEntity
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.io.Serializable
    ClubAbstractEntity is an abstract class needed for the abstract entity of the program. every entity will inherit from this class [Examples: Person, Student, Soldier]. It also declares some abstract methods to be implemented in each entity of the program [match(java.lang.String), validateData(), commit(), rollBack()]. It will also handle the basic gui initialization using JFrame- the frame itself, JPanel- the center panel and buttons container, JButton - the "OK"/"Cancel" buttons. Will also disable the cancel button until validate and commit when we hit ok - ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClubAbstractEntity

        public ClubAbstractEntity()
        Parameterless constructor - initializes the gui container component which is needed for each new entity in the system. It will also initialize the buttons and will wire them to the handler. ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler hanler - this is a handler to control the buttons pressing and its behavior

    • Method Detail

      • match

        public abstract boolean match(java.lang.String key)
        abstract method to control the matching machanism after Searching for an entity - returns true if found and false if wasnt found.
        Parameters:
        key - a key to match to
        Returns:
        retuns true if a match was found - false otherwise

      • validateData

        protected abstract boolean validateData()
        abstract method to be implemented in the inheriters of this class. Used to validate the new data that is inserted.
        Returns:
        true if the validation went succesffully, false otherwise.

      • commit

        protected abstract void commit()
        Used after the validation process ended succesfuly.

      • rollBack

        protected abstract void rollBack()
        rollBack is invoked if we started to add an entity and wanted to go back.

      • addToCenter

        protected void addToCenter(java.awt.Component guiComponent)
        a protected void method to allow the inheriters to add gui components to the center it recieves a gui component and adds it to the center of itself.
        Parameters:
        guiComponent - A component to add to the center

      • createGenericRow

        protected javax.swing.JPanel createGenericRow(java.lang.String labelName,
                                              javax.swing.JTextField textfield,
                                              javax.swing.JLabel strikeLabel)
        This protected method is used to create a row within a container. It should be used in every constructor that inherites from this class (that uses rows - - meaning every new entity in the system that has the rows in it. Makes less duplicated code and keeps the arrangement consistant.
        Parameters:
        labelName - the label name in the left side of the row
        textfield - the textfield
        strikeLabel - the premade strike label - by createGenericStrikeLabel()
        Returns:
        A container that contains a valid row for our gui.

      • createGenericTextField

        protected javax.swing.JTextField createGenericTextField(java.lang.String value)
        Each and every generic text field is defined the same for all the inheriters, therefore this method was created, to make it easy to add new textfield that will stay consistent throughout the system.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to be written in the text field
        Returns:
        a new textfield with the value and size 30

      • createGenericStrikeLabel

        protected javax.swing.JLabel createGenericStrikeLabel()
        Protected method to create a new strike label, paint it to red and sets its visible to be false. Each and every strikeLabel is the same throughout every row in the inheriters of this class.
        Returns:
        a new strike label
